Class TeamDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.TeamDAO
public class TeamDAO extends Object
TeamDAO

Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing team records in the Soccer Management System database.

Provides methods to:

  • Add a new team.
  • Update an existing team.
  • Delete a team by ID and name.
  • Get total count of teams.

Example Usage: 

 Team team = new Team("FC Barcelona", "Xavi Hernandez", 1899);
 boolean added = TeamDAO.AddTeam(team);
 team.setCoachName("Ronald Koeman");
 boolean updated = TeamDAO.UpdateTeam(team);
 boolean deleted = TeamDAO.DeleteTeam(team);
 int totalTeams = TeamDAO.getTeamsCount();

      public static boolean AddTeam(Team t)
      AddTeam Inserts a new team record into the database.
      Parameters:
      t - Team object containing team_name, coach_name, founded_year
      Returns:
      true if insertion succeeds, false otherwise

    • UpdateTeam

      public static boolean UpdateTeam(Team t)
      UpdateTeam Updates an existing team record based on team_id.
      Parameters:
      t - Team object containing updated team_name, coach_name, founded_year, and team_id
      Returns:
      true if update succeeds, false otherwise

    • DeleteTeam

      public static boolean DeleteTeam(Team t)
      DeleteTeam Deletes a team record from the database by team_id and team_name.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeds, false otherwise
